CHAT.comment: nina is still quite concerned with sleeping. she likes to talk about it and enacts sleeping situations constantly. however , she is now sleeping better at night. nina is on her dressing table. her mother is in the process of dressing her. nina has her comb in her hand.

u.a: nina points to her mother's comb and then back to her own comb .
points to a brush on the dressing table
nina is combing her hair
nina is confuses between the names for a comb and a brush
<1w-2w> not pronounced clearly
sesame street is a children's program on television
the monster is a puppet on sesame street is always stealing and asking for cookies
"nonnie" italian word for grandmother
Ernie is another puppet on sesame street
mother starts to comb nina's hair
mother is still in the process of dressing nina
nina laughs as mother pulls the turtleneck over nina's head

pulls back a small bunch of hair

mother starts to put the sock on nina's foot
nina puts one of the socks on her hand and pretends it's a puppet
nina does not finish saying the word "finger ."

mother laughs
mother puts socks on nina's feet
mother laughs

those are the words use on sesame street

nina continues to sing
noise of a bell ringing on one of nina's toys . nina continues to imitate the song from sesame street .
nina sings a few notes
mother and nina are looking a rubber teapot that our neighbor mrs . wood gave to nina . the pot squeaks when one squeezes it .
last two sentences mumbled very softly . they are hard to distinguish .
nina pretends to pour some tea in a cup . she offers the cup to her mother .
nina pours some more tea
the tea pot has a face painted on it's side
mother squeezes the teapot and makes it squeak
nina continues to make the teapot squeak
nina squeezes the teapot again
nina hands her mother a cup
nina has a small glass root beer mug which she was given at the a . and w . stand .
strange noises as mother looks around for the root beer mug . the noise drowns out the words of the next sentences .
mother goes into the kitchen to look for the root beer mug .
<aft> follows mother into the kitchen . it is hard to hear the words coming from there .
jabbering in a sing-song fashion .
mother and nina come back into her room .
hands a cup to her mother and then starts to pour the tea

nina has just received a small package in the mail from her grandmother . there is a small grey furry mouse inside . he is eating a piece of cheese .
mother hands the box to nina . nina is still holding a glass in her hand .
starts to take the mouse out of the box
nina really likes the mouse
nina had a friend last summer who used to always carry around a little mouse in her hand that looked just like the one that nina had just received .
mother hands nina a slightly larger cardboard box
points to the original box that the mouse came in
nina thinks the mouse belongs to Sandy . Sandy is the sister of Betta who owned a similar mouse to the one nina just received .
nina's diapers have fallen on the floor . nina picks them up and puts them back in place .

mother lies down on the floor . "nani" is the children's italian word for going to sleep .
hands nina the pop up book with the teddy bears

points to the teddy bear book

puts her hand over her mother's eyes pretending to to make her go to sleep .
mother is still lying on the floor pretending to go to sleep . nina covers her mother and goes through the same kind of routine that her mother follows when she puts nina to bed .
nina is trying to sing "twinkle twinkle little star ."
nina is mumbling . her words are very hard to distinguish .

the mouse in the picture is blowing a huge soap bubble which surrounds some other animals .
